about.Storyp: After living in a Buddhist temple, Laurin came back with no agenda‚Äîjust presence. He listened. One day, a friend said, ‚ÄúWouldn‚Äôt it be cool if learning worked like Google Maps?‚Äù The idea sat in the space between them, waiting. Laurin picked it up. Soon, others joined. That‚Äôs how LearnGraph quietly began.
about.Our-Team-text: We‚Äôre not just building a platform‚Äîwe‚Äôre living the practice.
about.team-Efecan: Head of Educational Strategy and Innovation
about.quote-Laurin: The best ideas come from stillness. LearnGraph wasn‚Äôt built to disrupt ‚Äî it was built to listen, to guide, and to grow with those who are ready to listen.
about.quote-Nawa: The world is a really big place and there are people that have been privilleged with resources, it's the duty of those people to help the ones without
about.quote-Efecan: Education is not about filling a vessel, but about kindling a flame - and I intend to set the whole system ablaze.
about.quote-Talal: It's scary out there, but we were never meant to be alone. Whats important isn't what I can do for me its what everyone can do for the human race
about.quote-Jamileh: I‚Äôve seen what it means when education is denied‚Äîwhen brilliant minds are turned away because of where they come from or who they are. LearnGraph gives that dignity back. If you have the skill, you deserve the recognition. No borders. No exceptions.
about.quote-Jamal: Across the Arab world and beyond, people are dreaming of a new kind of education ‚Äî one that empowers, uplifts, and transforms. At LearnGraph, I‚Äôm here to help turn that vision into reality.

insight1.title: 23% Graduation Increase
insight1.description: Georgia State University used predictive analytics to target at-risk students, resulting in a 23% increase in graduation rates and a 5% decrease in the achievement gap.

insight2.title: 5% decreased achievement gap
insight2.description: The University of Arizona's personalized interventions based on predictive analytics led to a 7% increase in retention rates and a 10% boost in graduation rates.

insight3.title: 30% Retention Improvement
insight3.description: Studies suggest that sophisticated learning analytics can improve student retention by up to 30%, demonstrating the power of technology in education.

insight4.title: 11% Reduced failure rates
insight4.description: A meta-analysis shows active learning reduces failure rates from 32% to 21% and improves exam performance significantly, underscoring its benefits in STEM courses.

university.insightsSummary: Data-driven interventions and active learning strategies can significantly enhance student retention, reduce failure rates, and boost graduation outcomes.

hero.title: Building the Infrastructure of Global Intention

content.paragraph1: What if we could make our shared desire to end war and fight climate change visible? Imagine a living map of everyone learning, working, and striving toward these goals ‚Äî their energy not scattered, but connected, inspiring, and strengthening each other. What if we could visualize this global movement in real time, creating a network where each effort builds momentum for the next?
content.paragraph2: Now imagine if we could also reveal the paths they took ‚Äî the skills they learned, the steps they followed ‚Äî and make it easy for anyone to follow in their footsteps, almost like simply walking up a staircase. That is the infrastructure we are building: a bridge between aspiration and action, a way to make every learner, every worker, part of a collective force for good.
